Swarovski Illuminates Dubai's Skyline with a Burj Khalifa Takeover

chunks.text:
In celebration of Swarovski’s latest collaboration with renowned and popular singer, Ariana Grande, the brand marked the regional launch of this milestone moment by taking over a beloved Dubai icon. On February 4th, 2025, Swarovski shined tall amidst the glistening skyline of Dubai with a spectacular display on the Burj Khalifa.​
 <http://image.noreply.swarovski.com/lib/fe31157075640575701378/m/1/78b1c364-a54c-4ccb-a009-b76b414fdef7.gif> 	
The star-studded event welcomed an array of celebrities, regional influencers, and friends of the brand including Nadine Njeim, Joelle Mardinian, Ella Kadoura, Maritta Hallani, Jessica Kahawaty, Nathalie Fanj, Zeyne, Karen Wazen, Ebrahim Samadi and many more.​
 <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/ba5jCK5wxUrBPvySAsvT5MQ1Z?domain=click.noreply.swarovski.com>
